column2: the cocktail I got felt very experimental. I can't recall the name
column3: but it had smoked pineapple juice with a dragon fruit salt rim served in a martini glass. It was a nice
column4: surprising flavor in the first sip
column5: but this is the type of cocktail that shouldn't be in a martini glass. There's so much more juice than alcohol
column6: and having room temp. pineapple juice is unappetizing. Not to mention
column7: the smoky scent is so strong and the dragon fruit salt so pungent
column8: there's just too many overpowering things in one sip. I would prefer a regular pineapple juice cocktail
